pr_title: Add ignore for empty vendor list

timeline.body: I think we can leave `0` here, since it is non-regular version.
timeline.bodyText: I think we can leave 0 here, since it is non-regular version.
timeline.bodyHTML: I think we can leave 0 here, since it is non-regular version.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.body:
We can do version checking as `<= 0` (see upper comment).
Also, i'd like see more granular message here, with included input version, like: `Vendor list of {0} version is not valid`
